actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to expand the boundary of the George Washington Birthplace National Monument, and for other purposes.
short_title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 2000

summary.text: George Washington Birthplace National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 2000 - Modifies the boundary of the George Washington Birthplace National Monument in Virginia to include certain lands comprising approximately one acre.

titles.title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 2000
A bill to expand the boundary of the George Washington Birthplace National Monument, and for other purposes.
